resources:
// Generics Next Finished // Login Activity Login Lloyds Student // First Time Setup Lloyds Student Setup Welcome to Lloyds Student your all-in-one finance solution during Uni ! \n\nIn order to set up your Lloyds Student App we need to take a few details to link your bank account with the app and get you started 1. Online Banking User ID 2. Online Banking Password Next we need you to set-up a four digit passcode which you\'ll use each time you log into the app to keep your details secure try to make your passcode memorable but also unique and secure Passcode: Confirm: Sorry but your online login details didn\'t match our records (Make sure you\'re using your Online Banking Login) Sorry but your inputs didn\'t match. Please try again making sure you enter both passcodes the same // Budget Activity My Weekly Budget Is\u00A0 You\'ve spent less than last week You\'ve got\u00A0\u00A0 \u00A0 left this week // Chart Titles Where You\'re Spending Welcome to Lloyds Student. \n\nPlease enter your 4 digit pass code to Login and View your account Lloyds Student Hello World Menu Login Menu Main Action Settings Activity Login Mike Williams LAST LOGIN 11:56 NEWCASTLE Student Account £2000.00 20-14-19 | 12345678 Make a Transfer Pay a Contact Homepage
Account Overview Balance Interest Rate Overdraft Limit 0.5% £1500.00 FirstTime Last Month This Month 29th August Amazon EU -£12.99 29th August T.K MAXX -£52.99 24th August WWW.CASH.COM +£82.51 19th August Cash Withdrawal -£100.00 Don\'t Recognise This ? Call Us Now If you don\'t recognise this payment/transfer we might need to take some action. To keep your money safe we need you to call our Fraud Team right away to investigate this transaction. Transfer money between your Lloyd\'s accounts From: To:
Current Account
Savings Account
Joined Account
Enter the account details of the person you want to pay (Limit: Minimum £1, Maximum daily: £300) Home Banking should always be as safe as possible. We use the latest online security measures to protect your money, your personal information and your privacy. We guarantee to refund your money in the unlikely event you experience fraud with our Internet Banking service - as long as you\'ve been careful, for example, by taking reasonable steps to keep your security information safe. We protect you with safeguards that meet Industry Standards. Lloyds Bank plc is authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority under registration number 119278. Authorisation can be checked on the Financial Services Register at www.fca.org.uk. Lloyds Bank plc are members of the Financial Services Compensation Scheme and the Financial Ombudsman Service. We subscribe to the Lending Code; copies of the Code can be obtained from www.lendingstandardsboard.org.uk. Transfer money between your accounts Confirm your transaction details Amount Payment Reference Pay a Contact Red Green Yellow
Account Management
Accessibility
Settings
Lloyd\'s Banking Tour
Contact Us
Terms and Conditions
FAQs
Send feedback
About
Log Out
Log Out Are you sure you want to Quit ? Yes No If you have any query regarding your online banking or report a card lost or stolen then you can use one of the below options. Email Call Us Live Chat Call the helpline Your call may be recorded for training or monitoring purposes. Call charges applies, Please check with your local provider for more information. Cancel Call Email This will take you into an email app. We will respond back to you within 2 working days. Cancel Email We greatly value your feedback to help us maintain our current features. You could make a real difference to our service and it would really help us understand what we have to do in order to give a better service to our customer\'s. Submit Welcome to your Lloyds Banking Tour We will go though each aspect of the Lloyds Mobile Banking Application. \nSwipe to find out more. You can switch between tabs easily with a touch of a button. There are three buttons at the top of the screen which will take you to different aspect of the Lloyds Banking App. You are ready to try the app for yourself. Feel free to come again and go through these tour to familiarise your self with what Lloyds Banking Group offers. Swipe to the right of the screen to access the Help Menu. Here you will find all the necessary settings and functions which are associated with Lloyds Banking Group. Manage and access your money instantly. With the help of Lloyds Banking App, you get to view your account balance, transactions and also get to switch between other accounts. Fraud Detection feature in place to keep your money safe. If you don\'t recognise a transaction on your Account Overview, you can report it straightaway to our Fraud Team with a touch of a button. Now it\'s been made easier for you to transfer money to a payee with using our Lloyds Banking App. Transactions are carried out instantly and within minutes it will appear on your Account Overview. Update your details Change Passcode Change Account name Change Background NetworkErrorActivity
